review_title: They really care about their employees

pros: GHS has great benefits and opportunities to advance into supervisory roles. The CEO of this company really care about their employees. Great bonuses at the end of the year even for part-time employees.
cons: I can't think of any cons of this organization.

pros: This has been the best nursing job I have had in my career. I would not hesitate to recommend this job to anyone.

job_title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO) in Flint, MI
pros: Great people, true to their mission. They value employees and embrace diversity.
cons: Could use better buildings. Getting old and worn.

review_title: Good company to work for social work
job_title: Mental Health Worker in Flint, MI
pros: It depends on the department, but company culture is fun and easy going. Good benefits. People choose to spend their career here.   PTO includes sick days and vacation.  There is a union for non-managment positions, so the likelihood of losing your job if you are in a non management position are low unless you do something really egregious.
cons: There is only one health provider from which to choose.  They use to have Blue Cross Blue Shield.   Unless you possess a social work degree or social sciences, mobility is non-existent and this is not the place for you to spend a career.

review_title: Working as  greeter at Genesee Health Systems
pros: Friendly people, decent environment, and conveniently located.
cons: It's a desk job that is somewhat boring.

pros: Great pay, benefits and work life balance.
cons: With behavioral healthcare in a state of flux at the moment, executive leadership is having difficulty maintaining clear direction.

job_title: Direct Care Worker in Flint, MI
pros: You don't work weekends or holidays. Offers benefits
cons: wages are frozen at a certain dollar amount so you can not get raises after you reach that amount.
